roleset.name: move in a stealthy manner

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Why had he-1 crossed the dark water [*T*-1] , [*] to bring back a group ofreclaimed soldiers or [*]-1 to skulk in a foul-smelling hole ? ?

roleset.note: Comparison with 'walk.' VerbNet class run-51.3.2. Framed by Neville.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'skulk' based on sentences in brown corpus.
